QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, patient_state + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value, calendar_date, 44814724 PeriodTypeConceptId, 'Private Source 17' PayerSource FROM {sc}.enrollment JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
